sentence.Network_en: He looked at her vague shape through the frosted glass.
sentence.Network_cn: 他透过雾蒙蒙的眼镜注视着她模糊的身形。

sentence.Network_en: The fields have frosted over in this wintry morning.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这寒冷的早晨田野里覆盖着一层霜.

sentence.Network_en: The cold has frosted the windows.
sentence.Network_cn: 寒冷的天气使窗子结满了霜.

entry.def: Frosted glass is glass that you cannot see through clearly.

example.ex: The top half of the door to his office was of frosted glass.
example.tran: 他办公室门的上半部分是磨砂玻璃。

entry.def: Frosted means covered with something that looks like frost.

example.tran: 一盘撒有糖霜的纸杯蛋糕

means.word_mean: 1. (of glass) having a roughened coating resembling frost;
